name: Firefox
description: Firefox is a safe and efficient browser. It's characterized with fast speed, privacy protection, rich plug-in resources, data sync between different devices, tabbed browsing, customization and other features.

en_US.description: Mozilla Firefox is a safe and efficient browser. It's characterized with fast speed, privacy protection, rich plug-in resources, data sync between different devices, tabbed browsing, customization and other features.
en_US.name: Mozilla Firefox

zh_CN.description: 火狐浏览器是一个安全高效的浏览器，它具有速度快、隐私保护、丰富的插件资源、不同设备之间同步数据、分页浏览、个性化定制等特性。
zh_CN.name: 火狐浏览器
